GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V APPROACHED BY PIRATES IN 02-43N 004-32E
   AT 041100Z FEB. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 111412Z FEB 17.
